string-array.name: PATasks
string-array.item: Take a picture of team members posing with a fish! Upload the picture to your Facebook page, tag “Jerusalem Scavenger Hunts” with a great caption.
Take a pic of team members participating in a street performance. Upload it to your Facebook page, tag “Jerusalem Scavenger Hunts” with a great caption.
Take a picture with “Melech HaHalva”. Upload the picture to your Facebook page and tag “Jerusalem Scavenger Hunts” with a great caption.

string-array.name: SDTasks
string-array.item: Shop until you drop: Buy 1 lafa (לפה)and 20 gr za’atar (זעתר)
תעשה עסק: Exchange your “Israel ScaVentures” flashlight for another object. Continue exchanging until you got your best deal – עסק! We’ll see who got the best עסק!

string-array.name: MGTasks
string-array.item: Find 3 people whose first names is David (not from your group). Ask each of them to write their name and their favorite song in your notepad.
Interview a seller. Write: what do they sell, how long they have been at the shuk, what do they enjoy about their work, what do they want people to know about Jerusalem?
Find someone who will give you a traditional recipe. Write it down in your notepad.
Find someone (not in your group) who comes from the same place as one of your team members. Write in your notepad 3 things they have in common.
Find someone from Morocco, Yemen or Greece. Write in your notepad when and how they got to Israel.
Find a couple that has been married for less than 5 years. Write in your notepad where they live now. How often do they come to the shuk?
Meet a passerby. Find out their favorite place in Jerusalem, write in your notepad why it is their favorite place.
Meet a passerby. Ask them to tell you the story of how their family came to Israel (made Aliyah).

string-array.name: ShukTTasks
string-array.item: “Rogelach” (רוגלאך): What is it? Where can you find the cheapest Roglach today? How much does it cost?
“Basta” (בסטה): What is it? If your team could start a new Basta here shuk, what do you think would be successful?
“Hawaj” (חוואג): What is it? Write down a name of a store where you can buy it.
How many languages at the shuk? Ask people speaking languages other than English to write in their language the word “apple” in one page in your notepad.

string-array.name: GR8Tasks
string-array.item: How many stalls there are all together on Eitz HaChayim street? Write your answer in your notepad.
On what street is will you find Rechov Agas 1? Write in your notepad some information about the place.
Find a synagogue in the Shuk. Write in your notepad on what street it is.
Find Zangi Yechezkel, Linens and Bedding. Write in your notepad how long they have been working in the shuk.
Find: “Morris” (small meat restaurant). Write in your notepad 5 items from their menu.
Find the Iraqi market. Write in your notepad the most interesting thing you see in the Iraqi market.
Find the Etrog Man. Write in your notepad all the juices he stocks. If you had a migraine, how would he help you?
